00077 static double * ddCofMintermAux ARGS((DdManager *dd, DdNode *node, st_table *table));

00102 double *
00103 Cudd_CofMinterm(
00104   DdManager * dd,
00105   DdNode * node)
00106 {
00107     st_table    *table;
00108     double      *values;
00109     double      *result = NULL;
00110     int         i, firstLevel;
00111 
00112 #ifdef DD_STATS
00113     long startTime;
00114     startTime = util_cpu_time();
00115     num_calls = 0;
00116     table_mem = sizeof(st_table);
00117 #endif
00118 
00119     table = st_init_table(st_ptrcmp, st_ptrhash);
00120     if (table == NULL) {
00121         (void) fprintf(stdout,"out-of-memory, couldn't measure DD cofactors.\n");
00122         return(NULL);
00123     }
00124     size = dd->size;
00125     values = ddCofMintermAux(dd, node, table);
00126     if (values != NULL) {
00127         result = ALLOC(double,size + 1);
00128         if (result != NULL) {
00129 #ifdef DD_STATS
00130             table_mem += (size + 1) * sizeof(double);
00131 #endif
00132             if (Cudd_IsConstant(node))
00133                 firstLevel = 1;
00134             else
00135                 firstLevel = cuddI(dd,Cudd_Regular(node)->index);
00136             for (i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00137                 if (i >= cuddI(dd,Cudd_Regular(node)->index)) {
00138                     result[dd->invperm[i]] = values[i - firstLevel];
00139                 } else {
00140                     result[dd->invperm[i]] = values[size - firstLevel];
00141                 }
00142             }
00143             result[size] = values[size - firstLevel];
00144         } else {
00145             dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00146         }
00147     }
00148 
00149 #ifdef DD_STATS
00150     table_mem += table->num_bins * sizeof(st_table_entry *);
00151 #endif
00152     if (Cudd_Regular(node)->ref == 1) FREE(values);
00153     st_foreach(table, cuddStCountfree, NULL);
00154     st_free_table(table);
00155 #ifdef DD_STATS
00156     (void) fprintf(stdout,"Number of calls: %d\tTable memory: %d bytes\n",
00157                   num_calls, table_mem);
00158     (void) fprintf(stdout,"Time to compute measures: %s\n",
00159                   util_print_time(util_cpu_time() - startTime));
00160 #endif
00161     if (result == NULL) {
00162         (void) fprintf(stdout,"out-of-memory, couldn't measure DD cofactors.\n");
00163     }
00164     return(result);
00165 
00166 } /* end of Cudd_CofMinterm */

00199 static double *
00200 ddCofMintermAux(
00201   DdManager * dd,
00202   DdNode * node,
00203   st_table * table)
00204 {
00205     DdNode      *N;             /* regular version of node */
00206     DdNode      *Nv, *Nnv;
00207     double      *values;
00208     double      *valuesT, *valuesE;
00209     int         i;
00210     int         localSize, localSizeT, localSizeE;
00211     double      vT, vE;
00212 
00213 #ifdef DD_STATS
00214     num_calls++;
00215 #endif
00216 
00217     if (st_lookup(table, (char *) node, (char **) &values)) {
00218         return(values);
00219     }
00220 
00221     N = Cudd_Regular(node);
00222     if (cuddIsConstant(N)) {
00223         localSize = 1;
00224     } else {
00225         localSize = size - cuddI(dd,N->index) + 1;
00226     }
00227     values = ALLOC(double, localSize);
00228     if (values == NULL) {
00229         dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00230         return(NULL);
00231     }
00232 
00233     if (cuddIsConstant(N)) {
00234         if (node == DD_ZERO(dd) || node == Cudd_Not(DD_ONE(dd))) {
00235             values[0] = 0.0;
00236         } else {
00237             values[0] = 1.0;
00238         }
00239     } else {
00240         Nv = Cudd_NotCond(cuddT(N),N!=node);
00241         Nnv = Cudd_NotCond(cuddE(N),N!=node);
00242 
00243         valuesT = ddCofMintermAux(dd, Nv, table);
00244         if (valuesT == NULL) return(NULL);
00245         valuesE = ddCofMintermAux(dd, Nnv, table);
00246         if (valuesE == NULL) return(NULL);
00247 
00248         if (Cudd_IsConstant(Nv)) {
00249             localSizeT = 1;
00250         } else {
00251             localSizeT = size - cuddI(dd,Cudd_Regular(Nv)->index) + 1;
00252         }
00253         if (Cudd_IsConstant(Nnv)) {
00254             localSizeE = 1;
00255         } else {
00256             localSizeE = size - cuddI(dd,Cudd_Regular(Nnv)->index) + 1;
00257         }
00258         values[0] = valuesT[localSizeT - 1];
00259         for (i = 1; i < localSize; i++) {
00260             if (i >= cuddI(dd,Cudd_Regular(Nv)->index) - cuddI(dd,N->index)) {
00261                 vT = valuesT[i - cuddI(dd,Cudd_Regular(Nv)->index) +
00262                             cuddI(dd,N->index)];
00263             } else {
00264                 vT = valuesT[localSizeT - 1];
00265             }
00266             if (i >= cuddI(dd,Cudd_Regular(Nnv)->index) - cuddI(dd,N->index)) {
00267                 vE = valuesE[i - cuddI(dd,Cudd_Regular(Nnv)->index) +
00268                             cuddI(dd,N->index)];
00269             } else {
00270                 vE = valuesE[localSizeE - 1];
00271             }
00272             values[i] = (vT + vE) / 2.0;
00273         }
00274         if (Cudd_Regular(Nv)->ref == 1) FREE(valuesT);
00275         if (Cudd_Regular(Nnv)->ref == 1) FREE(valuesE);
00276     }
00277 
00278     if (N->ref > 1) {
00279         if (st_add_direct(table, (char *) node, (char *) values) == ST_OUT_OF_MEM) {
00280             FREE(values);
00281             return(NULL);
00282         }
00283 #ifdef DD_STATS
00284         table_mem += localSize * sizeof(double) + sizeof(st_table_entry);
00285 #endif
00286     }
00287     return(values);
00288 
00289 } /* end of ddCofMintermAux */
